titles.title: Gender-Affirming CARE Act
Gender-Affirming Care Access Research for Equity Act
Gender-Affirming CARE Act

A bill to authorize the appropriation of funds to the National Institutes of Health and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for conducting or supporting research on barriers to gender-affirming care.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Gender-Affirming Care Access Research for Equity Act or the Gender-Affirming CARE Act
This bill authorizes appropriations for FY2024-FY2029 for the National Institutes of Health and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to conduct or support research on barriers to gender-affirming care and related health outcomes.
